values.caption: Reserved
Reserved
Program erase operation: erase all of program Flash memory (all pages must be unprotected
Upper program Flash memory erase operation: erases only the upper mapped region of program Flash (all pages in that region must be unprotected)
Lower program Flash memory erase operation: erases only the lower mapped region of program Flash (all pages in that region must be unprotected)
Page erase operation: erases page selected by NVMADDR
Row program operation: programs row selected by NVMADDR
Quad Word (128-bit) program operation: programs the 128-bit Flash word selected by NVMADDR
Word program operation: programs word selected by NVMADDR
No operation

NVMCON.name: BFSWAP
NVMCON.caption: Boot Flash Bank Alias Swap Control bit

values.caption: Boot Flash Bank 2 is mapped to the lower boot alias and boot Flash Bank 1 is mapped to the upper boot alias
Boot Flash Bank 1 is mapped to the lower boot alias and boot Flash Bank 2 is mapped to the upper boot alias

NVMCON.name: PFSWAP
NVMCON.caption: Program Flash Bank Swap Control bit

values.caption: Program Flash Bank 2 is mapped to the lower mapped region and program Flash Bank 1 is mapped to the upper mapped region
Program Flash Bank 1 is mapped to the lower mapped region and program Flash Bank 2 is mapped to the upper mapped region
Low-voltage detected (possible data corruption
Voltage level is acceptable for programming
Program or erase sequence did not complete successfully
Program or erase sequence completed normally
Enable writes to the WR bit and disables writes to the NVMOP bits
Disable writes to WR bit and enables writes to the NVMOP bits
Initiate a Flash operation
Flash operation is complete or inactive

NVMPWP.name: PWPULOCK
NVMPWP.caption: Program Flash Memory Page Write-protect Unlock bit

values.caption: Register is not locked and can be modified
Register is locked and cannot be modified

NVMBWP.name: UBWP0

values.caption: Write protection for physical address 0x01FC20000 through 0x1FC23FFF enabled
Write protection for physical address 0x01FC20000 through 0x1FC23FFF disabled

UBWPx bits are locked and cannot be modified

NVMCON2.name: SWAPLOCK
NVMCON2.caption: Flash Memory Swap Lock Control bits

values.caption: PFSWAP and BFSWAP are not writable and SWAPLOCK is not writable
PFSWAP and BFSWAP are not writable and SWAPLOCK is writable

PFSWAP and BFSWAP are writable and SWAPLOCK is writable
